paragraphs.content: Psalm 44
paragraphs.contentHtml: Psalm 44

paragraphs.content: To the chief Musician for the sons of Korah, Maschil.
paragraphs.contentHtml: To the chief Musician for the sons of Korah, Maschil.

paragraphs.content: We have heard with our ears, O God, our fathers have told us, what work thou didst in their days, in the times of old.
paragraphs.contentHtml: We have heard with our ears, O God, our fathers have told us, what work thou didst in their days, in the times of old.

paragraphs.content: How thou didst drive out the heathen with thy hand, and plantedst them; how thou didst afflict the people, and cast them out.
paragraphs.contentHtml: How thou didst drive out the heathen with thy hand, and plantedst them; how thou didst afflict the people, and cast them out.

paragraphs.content: For they got not the land in possession by their own sword, neither did their own arm save them: but thy right hand, and thine arm, and the light of thy countenance, because thou hadst a favour unto them.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For they got not the land in possession by their own sword, neither did their own arm save them: but thy right hand, and thine arm, and the light of thy countenance, because thou hadst a favour unto them.

paragraphs.content: Thou art my King, O God: command deliverances for Jacob.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou art my King, O God: command deliverances for Jacob.

paragraphs.content: Through thee will we push down our enemies: through thy name will we tread them under that rise up against us.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Through thee will we push down our enemies: through thy name will we tread them under that rise up against us.

paragraphs.content: For I will not trust in my bow, neither shall my sword save me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For I will not trust in my bow, neither shall my sword save me.

paragraphs.content: But thou hast saved us from our enemies, and hast put them to shame that hated us.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But thou hast saved us from our enemies, and hast put them to shame that hated us.

paragraphs.content: In God we boast all the day long, and praise thy name for ever. Selah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: In God we boast all the day long, and praise thy name for ever. Selah.

paragraphs.content: But thou hast cast off, and put us to shame; and goest not forth with our armies.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But thou hast cast off, and put us to shame; and goest not forth with our armies.

paragraphs.content: Thou makest us to turn back from the enemy: and they which hate us spoil for themselves.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou makest us to turn back from the enemy: and they which hate us spoil for themselves.

paragraphs.content: Thou hast given us like sheep appointed for meat; and hast scattered us among the heathen.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou hast given us like sheep appointed for meat; and hast scattered us among the heathen.

paragraphs.content: Thou sellest thy people for nought, and dost not increase thy wealth by their price.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou sellest thy people for nought, and dost not increase thy wealth by their price.

paragraphs.content: Thou makest us a reproach to our neighbours, a scorn and a derision to them that are round about us.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou makest us a reproach to our neighbours, a scorn and a derision to them that are round about us.

paragraphs.content: Thou makest us a byword among the heathen, a shaking of the head among the people.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou makest us a byword among the heathen, a shaking of the head among the people.

paragraphs.content: My confusion is continually before me, and the shame of my face hath covered me,
paragraphs.contentHtml: My confusion is continually before me, and the shame of my face hath covered me,

paragraphs.content: For the voice of him that reproacheth and blasphemeth; by reason of the enemy and avenger.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For the voice of him that reproacheth and blasphemeth; by reason of the enemy and avenger.

paragraphs.content: All this is come upon us; yet have we not forgotten thee, neither have we dealt falsely in thy covenant.
paragraphs.contentHtml: All this is come upon us; yet have we not forgotten thee, neither have we dealt falsely in thy covenant.

paragraphs.content: Our heart is not turned back, neither have our steps declined from thy way;
paragraphs.contentHtml: Our heart is not turned back, neither have our steps declined from thy way;

paragraphs.content: Though thou hast sore broken us in the place of dragons, and covered us with the shadow of death.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Though thou hast sore broken us in the place of dragons, and covered us with the shadow of death.

paragraphs.content: If we have forgotten the name of our God, or stretched out our hands to a strange god;
paragraphs.contentHtml: If we have forgotten the name of our God, or stretched out our hands to a strange god;

paragraphs.content: Shall not God search this out? for he knoweth the secrets of the heart.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Shall not God search this out? for he knoweth the secrets of the heart.

paragraphs.content: Yea, for thy sake are we killed all the day long; we are counted as sheep for the slaughter.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Yea, for thy sake are we killed all the day long; we are counted as sheep for the slaughter.

paragraphs.content: Awake, why sleepest thou, O Lord? arise, cast us not off for ever.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Awake, why sleepest thou, O Lord? arise, cast us not off for ever.

paragraphs.content: Wherefore hidest thou thy face, and forgettest our affliction and our oppression?
paragraphs.contentHtml: Wherefore hidest thou thy face, and forgettest our affliction and our oppression?

paragraphs.content: For our soul is bowed down to the dust: our belly cleaveth unto the earth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For our soul is bowed down to the dust: our belly cleaveth unto the earth.

paragraphs.content: Arise for our help, and redeem us for thy mercies’ sake.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Arise for our help, and redeem us for thy mercies’ sake.
